subject: Re: [junit] Digest Number 671
msgSnippet: I don t know about the other tools, but I do know how JUnit compares with an internal unit test harness that we created: Sheer simplicity Ours could do a lot
messageBody:
I don't know about the other tools, but I do know how
JUnit compares with an internal unit test harness that
we created:
Sheer simplicity

Ours could do a lot of really cool things but it was
so darn complicated that people did not use it. JUnit
is so simple that you will continue to use it, and
maintenance is easy as well.

--- junit@yahoogroups.com wrote:
> Thank you George for this reply.
> I really like JUnit and would like to use it as part
> our company testing
> procedures , but I need to justify the usage of it
> and to explain what are
> its advantages.
